query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS extraction_rules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  projectId INT,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  ruleType ENUM('event', 'character', 'setting', 'custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'custom',
  fields JSON NOT NULL,
  prompt TEXT,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  priority INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_project (userId, projectId),
  INDEX idx_active (isActive)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3zd7KKV3aCyZgdH.root --database 5ucNQ9ErrXVmTm66kpxNh3 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS extraction_rules (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  projectId INT,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  ruleType ENUM('event', 'character', 'setting', 'custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'custom',
  fields JSON NOT NULL,
  prompt TEXT,
  isActive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  priority INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_user_project (userId, projectId),
  INDEX idx_active (isActive)
);
